overview: Pratik Gupta is the Owner at Talkmylife with the responsibility of making Talkmylife a successful Website in the field of Social Network. Being a young entrepreneur from Ahmedabad, he currently holds an educational qualification in MBA-Finance from IBS Hyderabad and has also passed Level-1 of International CFA in June-2010. He also serves as the owner of Ashoka Enterprises, who is one of the leading distributors throughout Gujarat along with Prime Ceramics and Sanitrade in the field of providing a complete bathing solution.
